_header: Farewell my joy and my sweet heart
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 403.
_description: To his mistress: a lover on departing — two cross-rhymed quatrains

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Farewell my Ioy and my swete hartfare well myne owne hart rote…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …my hart ys yours wher euer that I gofor þu do I mone
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated twice for two further singing voices.
